comment.author: 66311327@N05
comment._content: "James Forman "Tod" Sloan (August 10, 1874 - December 21, 1933) was an American thoroughbred horse racing jockey." en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Tod_Sloan_%28jockey%29 Sloan's career as a jockey ended in 1901. This photo must have been taken long before 1910. A photo of him in 1915 is here:
